name: The Dawn of Distant Hymn
description: A bow that carries the melody of daybreak, said to have been forged from the first light of dawn.
descriptionRaw: A bow that carries the melody of daybreak, said to have been forged from the first light of dawn.
story:
In the age when the world was still young and the stars had just begun to sing their celestial hymns, there existed a melody that heralded the coming of dawn. This bow was forged from that very melody, capturing the essence of daybreak in its graceful form.

Legend tells of a time when darkness threatened to consume the world, and the people prayed for salvation. In response to their pleas, the first rays of dawn coalesced into this weapon, its strings woven from the golden light of sunrise and its frame carved from the hope of a new beginning.

When drawn, it sings with the voice of the morning star, each arrow carrying the promise of a new day. Those who wield it are said to be blessed with the courage to face any darkness, for they carry the eternal hope of dawn within their hearts.

The bow's melody changes with the passing of time - from the gentle whispers of early morning to the triumphant chorus of full daylight, it adapts to the rhythm of its wielder's soul, becoming an extension of their very being.
effectTemplateRaw:
Gain the Time's Rhapsody effect for 3s after leaving combat: Normal Attack/Elemental Skill/Elemental Burst DMG is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>{0}</color>. The equipping character can trigger this effect while off-field.
While in combat, the Time's Rhapsody effect will decrease by <color=#99FFFFFF>{1}</color> per second until it reaches 0%. When a Normal Attack/Elemental Skill/Elemental Burst hits an opponent, the Time's Rhapsody effect for the corresponding DMG type is increased by <color=#99FFFFFF>{2}</color> until it reaches <color=#99FFFFFF>{0}</color>. Two Witches: The above effect for when opponents are hit is changed so that hits increase the Time's Rhapsody effect for all DMG types by <color=#99FFFFFF>{3}</color>. Each type of DMG-type increase can be triggered once every 0.1s. The equipping character can trigger this effect while off-field.

When a Normal Attack/Elemental Skill/Elemental Burst hits an opponent, the Time's Rhapsody effect for the corresponding DMG type is increased by 10% until it reaches 60%. Two Witches: The above effect for when opponents are hit is changed so that hits increase the Time's Rhapsody effect for all DMG types by 20%. Each type of DMG-type increase can be triggered once every 0.1s. The equipping character can trigger this effect while off-field.
